author: MSNBC
title: ‎The Oath with Chuck Rosenberg on Apple Podcasts
content:
fbdfanatic ,

Mr Rosenberg is one of my favorite experts on MSNBC. His voice, quiet, measured manner and his thoughtful explanations of the law are always enlightening.

I have listened to the first two episodes of the podcast and thoroughly enjoyed them. I have heard Preet speak many times and yet this episode was almost totally new to me. I had never heard the “imposter” theory before, and it made me smile. I have purchased Preet’s book on Audible but have yet to listen to it. I will, for sure!
